concept.title: Plan Your Hardware
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes ways you can install Eucalyptus components on your machines.

conbody.p: You can run Eucalyptus components in any combination on the various physical servers in a data center. You can install the Cloud Controller, Walrus, CC, and SC on one machine, and an NC on one or more machines. Or you can install each component on an independent physical server. This gives each component the most local resource usage.

Often in installation decisions, you must trade deployment simplicity for performance. For example, if you place all cloud and cluster components on a single machine, it makes for simple administration. This is because there is only one machine to monitor and control for the Eucalyptus control services. But, each component acts as an independent web service. So if these components share a single machine, the physical resources available to each service could become a performance bottleneck.
